titleStmt.title: Articles to be inquired of, by the reuerende father in God, Richarde by Gods prouidence Bishop of Elye for the churchwardens and inquirers of euery seuerall parishe vvithin his diocesse, in his visitation, holden in the yeare of our Lord God, 1573.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Ely. Bishop (1559-1581 : Cox)
Cox, Richard, 1500-1581.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Bynneman, for Humfrey Toy,

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
